devdoc.author: Felipe Argento
devdoc.details: Every read performed by mi.memoryRead or mi.write should be followed by anendianess swap from little endian to big endian. This is the case becauseEVM is big endian but RiscV is little endian.Reference: riscv-spec-v2.2.pdf - Preface to Version 2.0Reference: Ethereum yellowpaper - Version 69351d5Appendix H. Virtual Machine Specification
devdoc.title: MemoryInteractor

userdoc.notice: Bridge between Memory Manager and Step
